titles.title: To provide for an additional temporary and permanent district court judgeship for the northern district of Ohio.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic and Commercial Law.

term.name: Advice and consent of the Senate

bill.summary: 7/21/1994--Introduced. Makes permanent an existing temporary district judgeship for the northern district of Ohio. Requires the President, by and with the advice and consent of the Senate, to appoint an additional temporary district judge for the northern district of Ohio.
